original: intros H_mult. unfold is_Rbar_mult, Rbar_opp in *. destruct x, y, z; try contradiction. - simpl. intros H. inversion H. - simpl. intros H. inversion H. - intros H. apply is_Rbar_mult_opp_l in H. apply is_Rbar_mult_sym in H. rewrite Rbar_mult'_opp_r in H. injection H as H'. rewrite H'. reflexivity.
